title: (x) Futura or Avant Garde w/ slanted cap A & V - ITC Avant Garde Gothic Alt {Stephen}
content:
It looks like avant garde or futura with the cap A and V on a heavy slant??  
I’ve seen it used as title treatments in fashion mags but can’t remember off hand which ones.  
muchas gracias :)

 [‹ Windows version or knock-off of the Apple font "New York"](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203204907/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41054 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Script - Lucida Handwriting {Akira} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203204907/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41055 "Go to next forum topic")
author: 032sally

comments.content: YES YES thanks Stephen you’re a champ!
